title: Calories in 3 Chicken Fingers
meta_description: Discover calories in 3 chicken fingers, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown, and easy tweaks for healthier options.
assumptions: Breaded, fried chicken tenders, approx 70g each, standard fast-food style with light breading, no added sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, breading thickness, cooking method, and portion; check labels or restaurant info when available.

quick_answer.text: 3 chicken fingers provide ~450 kcal and ~42 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp dipping sauce per finger

faqs.q: How many calories in one chicken finger?
faqs.a: About 150 kcal per breaded, fried chicken finger.

faqs.q: What is the protein in 3 chicken fingers?
Are chicken fingers high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, ~1350 mg total for 3, due to breading and seasoning.

faqs.q: How do baked chicken fingers compare in calories?
faqs.a: Baked versions are ~110 kcal each, reducing total to 330 kcal for 3.

faqs.q: Do chicken fingers have much fiber?
faqs.a: Very little, 0 g total for 3 under standard preparation.
